text: @realDonaldTrump WTF is the matter with you? Why would U cause dissent amongst voters & make a partisan issue out of what the coronavirus has caused. You cause problems & whine About the news reports on you & then either say they’re picking on U or it’s fake news. It is you that’s fake… Grow up.
